Hi, my name is Matti. I am a freelance web designer and front-end developer.

I'm available for hire.

Cobot – New Analytics

22 Jul 2013

Cobot is a webapp that frees coworking space managers from mundane tasks, giving them the time to do what is important: attending to their coworkers. The new analytics section gives coworking space managers a detailed insight into what is going on in their space. The Cobot team wrote an elaborate Blogpost about their new set of features.

I designed charts, tables and the interface which contains them. Afterwards I created the mockups and a small prototype that shows how the new section will integrate with the main application. Finally, I implemented the design within a rails app which uses handlebars.js for templating. The charts were built with D3.js by Alex from the Cobot team.
